movie.title: Drowning Echo
movie.description_intro: During a visit to friends, Sara begins having visions and is attacked by an unearthly creature in her friend's swimming pool; she soon discovers that anyone who comes into contact with the water is in danger and she is driven to confront the mystical and malevolent creature lurking in the depths.
movie.description_full: During a visit to friends, Sara begins having visions and is attacked by an unearthly creature in her friend's swimming pool; she soon discovers that anyone who comes into contact with the water is in danger and she is driven to confront the mystical and malevolent creature lurking in the depths.

movies.title: No Panic, with a Hint of Hysteria
movies.title_english: No Panic, with a Hint of Hysteria
movies.title_long: No Panic, with a Hint of Hysteria (2016)
movies.summary: A timid accountant tries to earn his living as a rather unsuccessful hitman, until an accidental killing of a mobster makes him a target for the vengeful mafia boss, murderous gangsters, trigger-happy cops and the dead man's psychotic wife - and if he's not careful his own wife might catch wind of his double life too.
movies.description_full: A timid accountant tries to earn his living as a rather unsuccessful hitman, until an accidental killing of a mobster makes him a target for the vengeful mafia boss, murderous gangsters, trigger-happy cops and the dead man's psychotic wife - and if he's not careful his own wife might catch wind of his double life too.

movies.title: Bending the Rules
movies.summary: A district attorney is determined to take down a corrupt New Orleans cop.
movies.description_full: A district attorney is determined to take down a corrupt New Orleans cop.
movies.synopsis: A district attorney is determined to take down a corrupt New Orleans cop.

movies.title: I Was at Home, But...
movies.summary: After a 13-year-old student disappears without a trace for a week and suddenly reappears, his mother and teachers are confronted with existential questions that change their whole view of life.
movies.description_full: After a 13-year-old student disappears without a trace for a week and suddenly reappears, his mother and teachers are confronted with existential questions that change their whole view of life.
movies.synopsis: After a 13-year-old student disappears without a trace for a week and suddenly reappears, his mother and teachers are confronted with existential questions that change their whole view of life.

movies.title: Rocky II
movies.summary: Rocky Balboa is enjoying life. He has a lovely wife, Adrian, had a successful fight with Apollo Creed and is able to enjoy the money he earned from the fight and a new endorsement deal. Unfortunately, Rocky becomes embarrassed when failing to complete an advert and ends up working in a meat packing company. He believes that he will no longer have a career as a boxer. Apollo wants to rematch with Rocky to prove all his critics wrong that he can beat Rocky. Can Rocky once again have a successful fight?
